K10D0337_H0341:420a-4: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0337_H0341:420a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
K10D0337_H0341:420a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das w'a ra n'a si drang
K10D0337_H0341:420a-7: srong smra ba'i ri dvags kyi nags na bzhugs te
K10D0337_H0341:420a-8: / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0337_H0341:420a-10: nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la /
K10D0337_H0341:420a-11: 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so //
K10D0337_H0341:420a-17: nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la /
K10D0337_H0341:420a-21: 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo
K10D0337_H0341:420a-22: zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes
K10D0337_H0341:420b-0: nga sngon ma thos pa'i @420b chos rnams la sdug
K10D0337_H0341:420b-1: bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes
K10D0337_H0341:420b-2: pas yongs su shes par bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid
K10D0337_H0341:420b-3: la byed pa na mig skyes so //
K10D0337_H0341:420b-9: nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal
K10D0337_H0341:420b-10: kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon
K10D0337_H0341:420b-11: par shes pas spang bar bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid
K10D0337_H0341:420b-12: la byed pa na mig skyes so //
K10D0337_H0341:420b-18: nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal
K10D0337_H0341:420b-19: 'gog pa shes pa 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas
K10D0337_H0341:420b-20: mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bya'o zhes tshul
K10D0337_H0341:420b-21: bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so //
K10D0337_H0341:420b-27: nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal
K10D0337_H0341:420b-28: 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de
K10D0337_H0341:420b-29: ngas mngon par shes pas bsgom par bya'o zhes tshul
K10D0337_H0341:420b-30: bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so //
K10D0337_H0341:420b-36: nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal
K10D0337_H0341:420b-37: 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas
K10D0337_H0341:420b-38: yongs su shes so zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed
K10D0337_H0341:421a-5: nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal
K10D0337_H0341:421a-6: kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon
K10D0337_H0341:421a-7: par shes pas spangs so zhes tshul bzhin yid la
K10D0337_H0341:421a-8: byed pa na mig skyes so //
K10D0337_H0341:421a-14: nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal
K10D0337_H0341:421a-15: la 'gog pa shes pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa de
K10D0337_H0341:421a-16: ngas mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas so
K10D0337_H0341:421a-17: zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes
K10D0337_H0341:421a-23: nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal
K10D0337_H0341:421a-24: 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de
K10D0337_H0341:421a-25: ngas mngon par shes pas bsgoms so zhes tshul bzhin
K10D0337_H0341:421a-26: yid la byed pa na mig skyes so //
K10D0337_H0341:421a-30: rtogs pa skyes so; ;dge slong dag /
K10D0337_H0341:421a-31: nga ji srid du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po
K10D0337_H0341:421a-32: 'di rnams la de ltar lan gsum du bzlas te
K10D0337_H0341:421a-33: rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i mig ma skyes
K10D0337_H0341:421a-37: rtogs pa ma skyes pa de srid du /
K10D0337_H0341:421a-38: nga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas /
K10D0337_H0341:421b-0: tshangs pa dang bcas dge sbyong dang @421b bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /
K10D0337_H0341:421b-2: mir bcas pa 'di las grol ba dang /
K10D0337_H0341:421b-3: nges par 'byung ba dang mi ldan pa dang /
K10D0337_H0341:421b-5: phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis mang du gnas par ma gyur cing /
K10D0337_H0341:421b-7: ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
K10D0337_H0341:421b-8: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes
K10D0337_H0341:421b-9: bya bar ma shes so; ;dge slong dag /
K10D0337_H0341:421b-10: ngas gang nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di rnams la de ltar lan gsum du bzlas te /
K10D0337_H0341:421b-11: rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i mig skyes shing /
K10D0337_H0341:421b-15: rtogs pa skyes pa de nas nga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten /
K10D0337_H0341:421b-19: bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /
K10D0337_H0341:421b-21: mir bcas pa 'di las grol ba dang /
K10D0337_H0341:421b-22: nges par 'byung ba dang mi ldan pa dang /
K10D0337_H0341:421b-24: phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis mang du gnas par gyur cing /
K10D0337_H0341:421b-26: ngas de nas bla na med pa yang dag par
K10D0337_H0341:421b-27: rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
K10D0337_H0341:421b-28: so zhes bya bar shes so //
K10D0337_H0341:421b-29: chos kyi rnam grangs de bka' stsal pa na tshe dang ldan pa koondi n+yi dang /
K10D0337_H0341:421b-30: lha brgyad khri chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so //
K10D0337_H0341:422a-1: kyis tshe dang ldan pa koondi n+ya la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0337_H0341:422a-3: khyod kyis chos kun shes sam /
K10D0337_H0341:422a-12: tshe dang ldan pa koondi n+yas chos kun shes pas
K10D0337_H0341:422a-13: de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa koondi n+ya kun shes
K10D0337_H0341:422a-14: koondi n+ya zhes tshig bla dvags su btags so //
K10D0337_H0341:422a-15: tshe dang ldan pa koondi n+yas chos kun shes so
K10D0337_H0341:422a-16: zhes sa bla'i gnod sbyin rnams sgra sgrogs par byed
K10D0337_H0341:422a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis w'a ra n'a sir drang srong
K10D0337_H0341:422a-19: smra ba'i ri dvags kyi nags su lan gsum bzlas
K10D0337_H0341:422a-20: te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo
K10D0337_H0341:422a-21: chos dang ldan pa dge sbyong ngam /
K10D0337_H0341:422a-26: sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba /
K10D0337_H0341:422a-27: skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K10D0337_H0341:422a-28: skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
K10D0337_H0341:422a-29: 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /
K10D0337_H0341:422a-33: bde ba'i phyir bskor bas lha'i ris mngon par 'phel
K10D0337_H0341:422a-34: zhing lha ma yin gyi ris yongs su nyams so
K10D0337_H0341:422a-36: sa bla'i gnod sbyin rnams kyi sgra thos nas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin dang /
K10D0337_H0341:422b-0: rgyal chen bzhi po'i @422b ris dang /
K10D0337_H0341:422b-1: sum cu rtsa gsum po'i lha dang /
K10D0337_H0341:422b-5: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams nas /
K10D0337_H0341:422b-11: yud tsam de la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra sgrags so //
K10D0337_H0341:422b-12: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang sgra sgrogs par byed de /
K10D0337_H0341:422b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis w'a ra n'a sir drang srong
K10D0337_H0341:422b-15: smra ba'i ri dvags kyi gnas su lan gsum du
K10D0337_H0341:422b-16: bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi chos kyi 'khor
K10D0337_H0341:422b-17: lo chos dang ldan pa dge sbyong ngam /
K10D0337_H0341:422b-22: sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par 'ga' yang ma bskor ba /
K10D0337_H0341:422b-23: skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K10D0337_H0341:422b-24: skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
K10D0337_H0341:422b-25: 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /
K10D0337_H0341:422b-29: bde ba'i phyir bskor bas lha'i ris mngon par 'phel
K10D0337_H0341:422b-30: zhing lha ma yin gyi ris yongs su nyams so
K10D0337_H0341:422b-32: bcom ldan 'das kyis w'a ra n'a sir drang srong
K10D0337_H0341:422b-33: smra ba'i ri dvags kyi nags su lan gsum du
K10D0337_H0341:422b-34: bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor
K10D0337_H0341:422b-35: lo chos dang ldan pa bskor bas de'i phyir chos
K10D0337_H0341:422b-36: kyi rnam grangs 'di la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
K10D0337_H0341:422b-37: ba zhes tshig bla dvags su btags so //
